|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC68 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = U Extreme |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2900 |series = RT-AC68 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACHN00 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1620, P55W-01 N2AW; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107:P; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, AiMesh, DFS (master), |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117B |manuf_rev = AC44 -ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = AsusWRT-Merlin
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/20/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 750 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 2167 |nqam2 = 750 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RT-AC86U REV 1.40" and "1650" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365350 board]. *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com
According to the ''[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365365 Model Names Confirmation Letter]'' at the FCC: {{Quote|text=Model No: *'''[[ASUS RT-AC86U]]''' (RT-AC86A/RT-AC86P/RT-AC86R/RT-AC86X) *'''ASUS RT-AC68U Extreme''', [[ASUS RT-AC2900]] (ASUS AC2900) :are identical in electrical, mechanical and physical design. The difference between these models is only for marketing purpose.}} {{see also|ASUS RT-AC86U|ASUS RT-AC68U|Arcadyan}}
''XX in the default SSID refers to the last two digits of 2.4GHz :MAC address found on the label on the back of the router.''
A Class II Permissive Change Letter submitted to the FCC 11/14/2017 :indicates two major changes to the product: *1. Add WLAN 5G band 2 and band 3 functions (DFS) *2. Add Mesh function. ([https://www.asus.com/aimesh/ AiMesh]) <!--{{FCC ST|05/09/2017|indexme.}}-->
{{seealso|ASUS RT-AC68}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac86u-hit-the-fcc.38770/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1780-asus-rt-ac86u-wireless-ac2900-dual-band-gigabit-router/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[https://www.asus.com/tw/forum/list?aid=74446 ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''Asus''' forums] (TW) *[http://www.asussmart.com/smart/557.html ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''AsusSmart'''] (CN)
==See also== [[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - ''10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card''
